mapper.select: SELECT cust.frst_reg_dt,cust.cust_nm,cust.pridtf_no,cust.eml_addr,cust.home_telno,cust.mbl_telno, cust.cr_nm,cust.road_nm_addr,cust.cust_sn,cust.pic_sn_vl, pic.pic_name,pic.tkcg_dept_nm,pic.pic_position,pic.pic_phone FROM kdt_cust_info_basc cust join kdt_pic_info_basc pic on cust.pic_sn_vl = pic.pic_sn_vl where cust.cust_sn = #{cust_sn};
SELECT cons.cons_date,cons.consultation FROM kdt_cust_info_basc cust join kdt_consultation cons on cons.cust_sn=cust.cust_sn WHERE cust.cust_sn = #{cust_sn};
SELECT cust_nm,cust_sn FROM kdt_cust_info_basc where cust_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT * from kdt_pic_info_basc where pic_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{new_pic_name}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE kdt_cust_info_basc SET cust_nm = #{customerDto.cust_nm}, pridtf_no =#{customerDto.pridtf_no}, eml_addr = #{customerDto.eml_addr}, home_telno =#{customerDto.home_telno}, mbl_telno = #{customerDto.mbl_telno}, cr_nm =#{customerDto.cr_nm}, road_nm_addr = #{customerDto.road_nm_addr} WHERE cust_sn = #{customerDto.cust_sn}
UPDATE kdt_cust_info_basc cust SET pic_sn_vl = ( SELECT pic_sn_vl FROM kdt_pic_info_basc WHERE pic_name = #{customerDto.pic_name} ) WHERE cust.cust_sn = #{customerDto.cust_sn}
